member.name: T:FastLz.FastLz
member.summary: Class for compressing and decompressing with FastLZ.

member.name: P:FastLz.FastLz.Version
member.summary: Gets the version of the library.

member.name: M:FastLz.FastLz.Compress(System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary:
Compress a block of data in the input buffer and returns the size of compressed block.
If the input is not compressible, the return value might be larger than the input buffer size.
The input buffer and the output buffer can not overlap.
Compression level can be specified in . At the moment, only level 1 and level 2 are supported. Level 1 is the fastest compression and generally useful for short data. Level 2 is slightly slower but it gives better compression ratio.
Note that the compressed data, regardless of the level, can always be decompressed using .
member.param: The compression level.
The buffer with the data to compress. The minimum input buffer size is 16.
The buffer to compress into. The output buffer must be at least 5% larger than the input buffer and can not be smaller than 66 bytes.
member.returns: The size of the compressed block.
member.exception: or is null.
or is too small.
is unknown.

member.name: M:FastLz.FastLz.Decompress(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary:
Decompress a block of compressed data and returns the size of the decompressed block. If error occurs, e.g. the compressed data is corrupted or the output buffer is not large enough, then an exception will be thrown instead.
The input buffer and the output buffer can not overlap.
Note that the decompression will always work, regardless of the compression level specified in (when producing the compressed block).
member.param: The buffer containing compressed data.
The buffer to decompress data into.
member.returns: The size of the decompressed data.
member.exception: or is null.
The compressed block in is using an unknown level.

member.name: T:FastLz.FastLzCompressionStream
member.summary: Represents a stream that can compress to a FastLZ compressed block.

member.name: M:FastLz.FastLzCompressionStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of .
member.param: The stream to write compressed data to.
The compression level. Can be 1 or 2.
Leave open when this stream is closed.
member.exception: is unknown.
is null.

member.name: M:FastLz.FastLzCompressionStream.Flush
member.summary: Performs the compression operation and writes the compressed block to the underlying stream.
member.remarks: Call only when all data to be compressed has been written to the stream. Subsequent calls will not do anything.

member.name: M:FastLz.FastLzCompressionStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Write data to be compressed.

member.name: T:FastLz.FastLzDecompressionStream
